<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fear Gem](/Equipment.aspx?ID=211)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 566 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Intimidating Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Dark smoke seems to writhe within this obsidian gem. When you activate the gem, you make an [Intimidating Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=368), as the fighter feat.

 If you have the Intimidating Strike feat, increase the frightened condition value from this Intimidating Strike to frightened 2, or frightened 3 on a critical hit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
